text: Comeback Season is the second mixtape by Canadian rapper Drake. Comeback Season was released on September 1, 2007. The mixtape include Drake when he was improving on his style of rapping and R&B; music. The song "Bitch Is Crazy" would be the first song in which Drake would sing on. Songs on the album feature themes like love, failing relationships and life in the city of Toronto. The mixtape contains the single "Replacement Girl" with Trey Songz which was released on April 30, 2007. The video was the very first music video from a Canadian musician to appear on BET. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2007 albums Category:Drake (musician) albums Category:Mixtape albums
title: Comeback Season (mixtape)
